author: Antony Worrall Thompson
method: Leave small ones whole, and halve or quarter larger ones. Add to hot dripping having dipped them in a light dusting of cayenne pepper and caster sugar. Bake for 35-45 minutes.
ingredients: 400g/1lb parsnips ,  100g/3Â½oz hot dripping,  pinch cayenne pepper,  55g/2oz caster sugar
